data.message:
Whatsup yall, my name's Dre T , ever feeling like you got no energy or motivation? Put down that red bull or monster! I got some natural energy for you.If you could take 3 minutes to check out my new single "Imma get it", it'll give you that energy you need before work or that gym motiviation . Whenever you're feeling down , sometimes you just gota tell yourself "IMMA GET IT!" No matter what! You have the ability to do anything if you put your mind to it! Never give up even when you're feeling down. You got this!
Thank you so much for taking the time to listen! 
Feedback is 100% Appreciated 
ADD ME! 
NEW MUSIC COMING SOON!!!
#MUCHLOVE #SHARE #LIKE #COMMENT

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ti_C2ap8xcQ
